title: SOUND OFF - OCT. 1
text:
By DONOVAN KLEIN October 1, 2015 Updated Oct 1, 2015 at 8:46 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, IND. (21ALIVE) - In this episode of Sound Off presented by Parkview Medicine, 21Alive's Tommy Schoegler and Kent Hormann are live from the SportONE/Parkview Fieldhouse. 
Will Andrew Luck be under center for the Colts when they host the Jacksonville Jaguars this Sunday? The guys discuss the health of the star QB and what it could mean if he is unable to suit up this weekend. 
College Football is back in full swing once again this weekend. The guys break down Notre Dame's big match-up against Clemson and if they have what it takes to remain undefeated. What are your thoughts CLICK HERE to leave us a "QUESTION OF THE DAY” comment. Want to be in the know for the next weather event, the next school closing or the next big breaking news story?
